reviewText:
A film with an habitual trio of director and actors.  Angelina, rock star with a declining career decides to follow her husband's plan to revive both their careers since her husband is also part of the band.  She supposedly drowns while she hiding in Thailand for a few months but cannot stand the solitude.  On coming back, life of deception and betrayal of those involved, creates an interesting conclusion.
P.S. Those not minding subtitles might be interested with other productions of same trio:  Under Solen, Queen of Sheba's Pearls, Snt r Livet (Such is life).  All interesting life stories.
